Detailed Description

Abstract class that can be used to write to e.g.

file or TCPSocket without knowing which it is.

Definition at line 25 of file Writeable.h.

Virtual destructor.

Should close and delete the containing resource.

Member Function Documentation

virtual ssize_t Writeable::write (  const byte *  buffer,
size_t  size,
uint32  timeout
)  [pure virtual]
 

Tries to copy size bytes from buffer.

Parameters:
buf The buffer to copy from.
size The number of bytes to write.
timeout The timeout. May or may not be implemented.
Returns:
The number of bytes written or a negative number if failure or timeout.

Implemented in TCPSocket, and ByteBuffer.
